title: How to Contact MSNBC News by Email, Phone & More

steps.title: Email MSNBCTVinfo@nbcuni.com to submit feedback or report an error.
steps.content: Email MSNBCTVinfo@nbcuni.com to submit feedback or report an error. Be sure to include as much information as possible, such as the date and/or airtime of the show. Alternatively, send tips or coverage ideas to tips@nbcuni.com or send editorial complaints or concerns to newsroom@nbcuni.com . steps.title: Email MSNBCTVinfo@nbcuni.com or call 212-413-6142 for press inquiries.
steps.content: Email MSNBCTVinfo@nbcuni.com or call 212-413-6142 for press inquiries. This is the 24/7 PR hotline for press inquiries. [13] X Research source Alternatively, you can try contacting MSNBC Public Relations on their X account or email them at NBCNewsMediaRelations@nbcuni.com . [14] X Research source

steps.title: Send letters to NBCU News Group Legal in New York City.
steps.content: Send letters to NBCU News Group Legal in New York City. If you wish to reach the lawyers at NBCU News Group, or have a contract with NBCU News Group and want to send a notice under the contract, mail a letter through an internationally recognized mail or courier service, such as FedEx or USPS, to the address below. You should also email a copy to newslegalnotices@nbcuni.com . [15] X Research source General Counsel NBCU News Group Legal 30 Rockefeller Plaza New York, NY, 10112

steps.title: Message MSNBC or MSNBC columnists on social media.
steps.content: Message MSNBC or MSNBC columnists on social media. You can reach out to MSNBC on their official X , Facebook , or Instagram accounts. The columnists who are on social media have their profile information on the MSNBC website. Just visit the MSNBC Daily Columnists page and click on the person you want to contact. If they provided their social media handle, it will be located under the “Follow” tab on their profile page. Once you’re on their social media page, open the message window and type in your comment, question, or idea. Try to include as much information as you can. For instance, you could write, “I had a question about a recent news story. You cited a research study about medical marijuana on a news program on February 2, but you didn't provide any information about the study. Can you give me the title and authors of that study?” Send your message by hitting the "return" button.

steps.title: Try direct messaging MSNBC news anchors on social media.
steps.content: Try direct messaging MSNBC news anchors on social media. Most anchors do not provide their email or personal contact details publicly, but you can always try shooting them a message on social media. Just look up the anchor’s profile on X , Instagram , or Facebook to send them a DM, and make sure their profile has a blue check mark beside it to verify it’s them. Rachel Maddow, host of The Rachel Maddow Show , is the only anchor who provides her contact information online. You can contact Rachel by sending her a Signal, WhatsApp, or Telegram message at 646-419-0218, emailing a news tip at rachel@msnbc.com , or mailing a letter to: The Rachel Maddow Show, 920-W4, 30 Rockefeller Plaza, New York, NY 10112. [16] X Research source

steps.title: Change your software settings or unsubscribe from the RSS feed.
steps.content: Change your software settings or unsubscribe from the RSS feed. If you’re receiving unwanted headlines and emails from NBCNews.com, your email client might be subscribed to one of their RSS feeds. You can simply open an email from NBC News, then click on the “Unsubscribe” button to the right of the sender’s email address to unsubscribe from their mailing list. [17] X Research source
